about_the_game:
Long ago Calla and Eris lived in harmony. Then, everything changed when the Goofy Tornadoes attacked. They swept the sheep all over the world and left two shepherds - Calla and Eris to save them. Even though our shepherds are very resilient, they have a lot of challenges before they're ready to save anyone. Are you brave enough to handle this adventure?






Engage in local 2-player coop gameplay where teamwork and communication are key to overcoming the game's obstacles.




Dive into the role of Calla or Eris, tackling unique challenges and puzzles on your own in a beautifully crafted single-player mode.




Take on the hero's quest to find and save the lost sheep of your village, each uniquely adorable and awaiting rescue.




Strategically navigate through fiery landscapes, using tools and clever thinking to manage and extinguish flames.




Laugh along with playful physics and ragdoll effects that turn every challenge into a joyful blunder.




Traverse through artistically rich environments, where each island offers a visual treat as unique as its puzzles.



- Play 2-player local coop
- Play solo
- Fun Physics and Ragdolls
- Solve puzzles to Save Sheep from danger!
- Flammable and Extinguishable world
- Leaderboards
- Collect Easter Eggs
- Keyboard and Controller support
- Ultra-wide support
